input.sentences: the couple had looked for months for a home | especially one for their baby .
they entered the foyer and were immediately surprised at the size..
and | the house already had a room that was perfect for a little boy ...
and | even a playground out back !
it was | truly | the perfect home .
output.sentences: The Johnson family decided it was time to buy a new home.
After months of looking they found one with a gorgeous entryway.
It already had a room that was perfect for their son.
It even had a playground already set up in the backyard!
It was the perfect home and they couldn't wait to move in.
